title: Lesson 5: The Biblical Storyline
description: Creation, Fall, Redemption, Restoration - the four-chapter story of the Bible, with Jesus at the center of the Old and New Testament.

blocks.text: The Bible is not just a collection of disconnected stories. It forms one cohesive narrative: God's perfect design in Creation, our rebellion in the Fall, His rescue mission through Redemption in Christ, and the ultimate promise of Restoration.
And he who was seated on the throne said, 'Behold, I am making all things new.'
3.1 - How does seeing the whole story of the Bible (from Creation to Restoration) give you hope for the future?
